title: Ostriches: Giant Birds
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,284 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 1060L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and S
description: Ostriches: Giant Birds explores many of the things that make these birds so fascinating. Students will learn about their appearance, enemies, offspring, and more. Maps and exciting pictures support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
